exception.name: ErrorTransactionLoggingNotLocked
exception.description: This exception is thrown by the SE API function unlockTransactionLogging if the transaction logging functionality is not currently locked.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorTransactionLoggingNotLocked that is thrown by the SE API function unlockTransactionLogging if the transaction logging functionality is not currently locked.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when attempting to unlock already unlocked transaction logging
